attributes.action: Remove any criminal liability for a motorist who travels through a red light to allow an ambulance to go.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We want to make sure that those people who do the moral thing, and move through a red light to permit the emergency services to get to their destination quicker are not penalised by a criminal driving conviction for running a red light.

Where would we be, and how many people would die, if motorists refused to move out of the way of emergency vehicles for fear of prosecution.
